name: Cottage cloth bag of fabric flowers
description: ****Summer is almost here at last**** This sale is for 6 handmade cloth flowers, printed with a vintage cold cream advertisement center. I used watercolors to color the outside of each flower. They are stuck in a vintage printed muslin bag. I added a black wire hanger to the bag. Measurements: bag, 9" tall x 7.5" wide, flowers, approx, 10.5" tall each. None of the flowers are glued in, so you can rearrange them any way you like! This arrangement would make a good wall hanging or the individual flowers would make great bowl fillers, shelf sitters,cupboard tucks, or plant pokes. I love the way they turned out! As always, this item comes from a clean, smoke-free home. Feel free to contact me with any questions. I combine shipping on multiple items

name: Primitive Americana Victory Belle Doll
description: ******** "Home Grown Victory Belle" *********This sale is for a handmade Americana doll originally designed by me.Her name is "Home Grown Victory Belle". She is signed & dated. She is made from duck canvas with an old flag serving as her clothes.Included is a handpainted flag to pose with her! Measurements: Doll,18" tall Flag, 8.5" tall x 6" wide. What a wonderful addition to any Americana collection, or as the perfect gift! I love the way she turned out. This doll is for decorative purposes only, not intended for small children. As always, this item comes from a clean, smoke-free home. Feel free to contact me with any questions. I combine shipping on multiple items. Thank you for stopping by!
